Package org.hibernate.tool.schema.extract.spi

Interface ColumnTypeInformation

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ColumnInformation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Column, ColumnInformationImpl, ExportableColumn
    public interface ColumnTypeInformation
    Provides access to information about existing table columns

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static ColumnTypeInformation EMPTY  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getColumnSize()
      The column size (length).
      int getDecimalDigits()
      The precision, for numeric types
      TruthValue getNullable()
      Is the column nullable.
      int getTypeCode()
      The JDBC type-code.
      String getTypeName()
      The database specific type name.

        TruthValue getNullable()
